Package uno.anahata.asi.status

Class StatusManager

java.lang.Object
uno.anahata.asi.model.core.BasicPropertyChangeSource
uno.anahata.asi.status.StatusManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeSource
public class StatusManager extends BasicPropertyChangeSource
Manages and broadcasts the real-time status of the chat session. This class leverages PropertyChangeSupport to provide reactive updates to the UI.
Author:
anahata

  • Method Details

    • fireStatusChanged

      public void fireStatusChanged(ChatStatus newStatus)
      Fires a status change event.
      Parameters:
      newStatus - The new status.

    • fireStatusChanged

      public void fireStatusChanged(ChatStatus newStatus, String detailMessage)
      Fires a status change event, optionally with a detail message.
      Parameters:
      newStatus - The new status.
      detailMessage - A detail message (e.g., for tool execution).

    • fireApiError

      public void fireApiError(ApiErrorRecord errorRecord, ChatStatus status, String detailMessage)
      Records an API error and sets the chat status.
      Parameters:
      errorRecord - The ApiErrorRecord to record.
      status - The new chat status to set.
      detailMessage - A detail message for the status change.

    • getApiErrors

      public List<ApiErrorRecord> getApiErrors()
      Gets an unmodifiable list of all recorded API errors.
      Returns:
      The list of errors.

    • clearApiErrors

      public void clearApiErrors()
      Clears all recorded API errors. This should be called upon a successful API response.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the status manager to its initial state.
